titleStmt.title: Euaggelion aionuon tes oukoumenes tes mellouses, or, The saints first revealed and covenanted mercies shortly approaching as being the main scope of revelation-prophesie : opened and resolved by Christ's divine key of prophesie ... / by W. Sherwin ...
titleStmt.author: Sherwin, William, 1607-1687?

notesStmt.note: First six words of title in Greek characters.
Duplicate copies appear at reel position 1070:6 and 7; 1070:6 incorrectly identified as Wing S3402.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
